snippet.title: The First Berserker: Khazan | Deep Dive on Weapons, Action, and Combat
snippet.description:
Get a glimpse of Khazan's combat system and core mechanics, showcasing the introduction of the spear and greatsword. Watch as Khazan displays stylish, skill-based combat while facing off against two powerful bosses in extended battles.
⚔ Sign up for the Technical Closed Beta Test: https://khazan.nexon.com/
⚔ Technical Closed Beta Test Schedule: Oct 11 - Oct 20 PDT
 
The First Berserker: Khazan is a hardcore action RPG based on DNF (Dungeon & Fighter) Universe that will be available on PC Steam, PlayStation 5, and Xbox Series X/S. As Khazan, the great general of the Pell Los Empire who overcame death, players will unveil the incidents that led to his downfall and seek vengeance on his enemies.
 
✨Learn more about The First Berserker: Khazan✨
Official Website: https://khazan.nexon.com/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/PlayKhazan
Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/@PlayKhazan
Discord: https://discord.gg/playkhazan
 
#Thefirstberserkerkhazan #Khazan #singleplayer #hardcoreaction #RPG #APRG #DNF #Dungeonfighteronline #DNFUniverse #action #steam #xbox #playstation #gameplay #gamescom #gamescom2024 #Volbaino #Rangkus
